name: voter_dist
title: Political Leanings by County
blurb:
Plot of relative Biden vs. Trump leanings in each county, blue and
            red blended based on percentages for either candidate but not adjusted for
            population/voter density.
spec_html:
Vote Distrib.

Color

100% Biden

70/30 Bid./Tr.

50/50 Dist.

30/70 Bid./Tr.

100% Trump

name: voter_dnsty_linear
title: Voter Density by County, No Density Adjustment
blurb:
Plot of voter density on US geographic map, color opacity
            normalized to densest county and opacity shown on linear scale as 
            county's/precinct's fraction of densest county in the nation.
spec_html:
Vote Distrib.

Voter Density

N/A

name: voter_dist_dnsty_linear
title: Political Leanings + Voter Density, No Density Adjustment
blurb:
Plot of relative Biden vs. Trump leanings in each county, blue and
            red blended based on precentages for either candidate, color opacity normalized
            to densest county and opacity shown on linear scale as county's/precinct's fraction
            of densest county in the nation.
spec_html:

Voter Density

name: voter_dnsty_bez_quadr
title: Voter Density by County, Quadratic Bezier Adjusted
blurb:
Plot of voter density on US geographic map, color opacity
            normalized to densest county and adjusted with quadratic bezier curve
            in order to better see less-dense counties.
spec_html:
Vote Distrib.

Voter Density

N/A
